item.title: The Tatiana Show - Judd Weiss Of The McAfee Presidential Campaign | Lets Talk Bitcoin
item.description:
The Tatiana Show - Judd Weiss Of The McAfee Presidential Campaign | Lets Talk Bitcoin

Tatiana and Josh interview Judd Weiss of the McAfee presidential campaign. Topics of discussion include Satoshi Nakamoto, the Libertarian Party, John McAfee and his presidential campaign. Judd Weiss is John McAfee's Vice Presidential running mate pick in the race for the Libertarian Party presidential nomination.

item.title: Is the Bitcoin Community Being too Harsh on Gavin Andresen?
item.description:
Is the Bitcoin Community Being too Harsh on Gavin Andresen?

Perhaps the biggest casualty of this week's Satoshi Nakamoto/Craig Wright fiasco has been Gavin Andresen. But has the Bitcoin community been fair to one of its hardest workers?

item.title: Bitcoin Core Team Has No Intentions Of Bringing Gavin Andresen Back
item.description:
Bitcoin Core Team Has No Intentions Of Bringing Gavin Andresen Back

This situation becomes especially painful when considering how Satoshi Nakamoto himself appointed Gavin Andresen as being the one to take over the "reigns" of Bitcoin development Now that the Craig Wright debacle has calmed down again, there is still the pressing matter of what will happen with Gavin Andresen.

item.title: Bitcoin Network Shows Signs of Improvement with Updated Core Versions - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Network Shows Signs of Improvement with Updated Core Versions - NEWSBTC

The performance improvements in bitcoin network have reduced the number of Orphan Blocks created on the Bitcoin network. Read more... The latest version of Bitcoin Core software has brought a lot of improvement in the performance of the Bitcoin network.

item.title: Blockchain and Biometrics Can Reduce Rampant Corruption
item.description:
Blockchain and Biometrics Can Reduce Rampant Corruption

One of the many issues that society still faces is corruption; this problem is especially troubling in under-developed nations. With the surge of Blockchain startups, identity will play an important role, can Blockchain Tech walk hand in hand with Biometrics?

item.title: BBC Once Again Shows How Clueless They Are About Bitcoin
item.description:
BBC Once Again Shows How Clueless They Are About Bitcoin

Moreover, the BBC determines the success of Bitcoin will hinge on whether or not blockchain technology will make a significant impact. Bitcoin has been getting a lot of mainstream media attention over the past week, yet most news outlets still fair to grasp the concept of this popular cryptocurrency.

item.description:

item.title: Can you have a password based cryptocurrency?
item.description:
Can you have a password based cryptocurrency?

Bitcoin is key based. Although it is possible to convert a password into a key, publishing the public key makes it vulnerable to brute force. Currently, passwords are used with Bitcoin, but only to

item.description:
Bitcoin Price Weekly Analysis - BTC/USD Remains In Clear Uptrend - NEWSBTC

item.title: Isle of Man Grants Designated Business Status To Coincorner
item.description:
Isle of Man Grants Designated Business Status To Coincorner

There is a lot of focus on regulating Bitcoin all over the world, particularly when exchanges and other money transmitting services are concerned. The Isle of Man is one of the most favorable regions for Bitcoin companies, and British exchange CoinCorner has received "Designated Business" status just a few days ago.
